title: Tip against mates for OPL bragging rights

replies.body: All these idiots trying to log in with their League accounts {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
when you go do the tip it will saying register it conncts to your league account
Can't log into the tipping either {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
ou have to make a account just for tipping on the website here https://opltips.com.au
it woint let me log in to the tipping?
Same. Im sure im typing the correct credentials. It says: Unable to locate user or invalid credentials.
you have to make a account just for tipping on the website here https://opltips.com.au
{{champion:412}} IS MY BAE I HOOK ALL DAYS{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
riot bring back sword of the occult
Yeah I can't log in either but I REALLY want that IP Boost cuz I got my eye on Janna

Hey Guys, if you are having problems - can you email them to contact@opltips.com.au - the guys running it will be able to assist.

You will need to make a new account though, your league one will not work on there yet!
